text: Francesca Bellettini (born 18 April 1970) is an Italian business woman. She has been the chief executive officer of Yves Saint Laurent since 2013. Due to the extraordinary growth of the company under her leadership, she has been named by the Financial Times as one of the 25 most influential women of 2022. ==References== Category:Italian businesspeople Category:Chief executives Category:1970 births
title: Francesca Bellettini
